thread.title: POLITICS: Monday deadline to register to vote in Nov. 3 election
thread.title_full: POLITICS: Monday deadline to register to vote in Nov. 3 election - Press Enterprise

author: JEFF HORSEMAN
title: POLITICS: Monday deadline to register to vote in Nov. 3 election
text:
By JEFF HORSEMAN / STAFF 16, 2015 Updated: 3:05 p.m. Those who want to vote in the Nov. 3 election need to register by Monday, Oct. 19.
Online applications to registertovote.ca.gov will be honored if theyâ€™re submitted by midnight Monday. So will paper applications postmarked by the deadline.
Paper applications can be found at the Riverside County Registrar of Voters office, 2724 Gateway Drive in Riverside, as well as Department of Motor Vehicles offices and post offices.
Voters are eligible if they are U.S. citizens, are at least 18 by Election Day and not declared mentally incompetent by a court. Certain criminal convictions also preclude people from registering and voters must re-register after changing their names, moving or changing their political party affiliation.
Not all areas of the county will vote in the Nov. 3 election. Information: 951-486-7200.
